arguments.name: fieldset
arguments.description: Arguments for the fieldset component (e.g. legend). See [fieldset](https://github.com/alphagov/govuk-frontend/blob/master/src/components/fieldset/README.md#component-arguments) component.

arguments.name: hint
arguments.description: Arguments for the hint component (e.g. text). See [hint](https://github.com/alphagov/govuk-frontend/blob/master/src/components/hint/README.md#component-arguments) component.

arguments.name: errorMessage
arguments.description: Arguments for the errorMessage component (e.g. text). See [errorMessage](https://github.com/alphagov/govuk-frontend/blob/master/src/components/error-message/README.md#component-arguments) component.

arguments.name: idPrefix
arguments.description: String to prefix id for each checkbox item if no id is specified on each item. If`idPrefix` is not passed, fallback to using the name attribute instead.

arguments.name: name
arguments.description: Name attribute for each checkbox item.

arguments.name: items
arguments.description: Array of checkbox items objects.

arguments.name: text
arguments.description: If `html` is set, this is not required. Text to use within each checkbox item label. If `html` is provided, the `text` argument will be ignored.

arguments.name: html
arguments.description: If `text` is set, this is not required. HTML to use within each checkbox item label. If `html` is provided, the `text` argument will be ignored.

arguments.name: id
arguments.description: Specific id attribute for the checkbox item. If omitted, then `idPrefix` string will be applied.

arguments.name: name
arguments.description: Specific name for the checkbox item. If omitted, then component global `name` string will be applied.

arguments.name: value
arguments.description: Value for the checkbox input.

arguments.name: label
arguments.description: Provide additional attributes and classes to each checkbox item label. See [label](https://github.com/alphagov/govuk-frontend/blob/master/src/components/label/README.md#component-arguments) component for more details.

arguments.name: hint
arguments.description: Provide optional hint to each checkbox item. See `hint` component for more details.

arguments.name: checked
arguments.description: If true, checkbox will be checked.

arguments.name: conditional
arguments.description: If true, content provided will be revealed when the item is checked.

arguments.name: conditional.html
arguments.description: Provide content for the conditional reveal.

arguments.name: disabled
arguments.description: If true, checkbox will be disabled.

arguments.name: attributes
arguments.description: Any extra HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the checkbox input tag.

arguments.name: classes
arguments.description: Optional additional classes to add to the checkboxes container.

arguments.name: attributes
arguments.description: Any extra HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the anchor tag.

accessibilityCriteria:
## Conditional reveals
Must:
- be visible as static content if JavaScript is unavailable or fails
- be hidden if JavaScript is available and is collapsed
- indicate if content is expanded or collapsed
- indicate that there is collapsed content to interact with

Note that we have known issues against this criteria: https://github.com/alphagov/govuk_elements/issues/575
